Package com.tome25.utils.lib

Class LibraryLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tome25.utils.lib.LibraryLoader
  • public class LibraryLoader
extends Object
    This class can add Jar Files to the classpath at runtime. You will need to copy this class into your project in order to add this library to the classpath at runtime.
    Author:
    ToMe25

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private static byte[] buffer  
      private static String DEFAULT_TOME25S_JAVA_UTILITIES_URL_STORAGE  
      private static Instrumentation instrumentation  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      LibraryLoader​(String[] mainArgs)
      Creates a new LibraryLoader, it is recommended to do this at the start of your program as this may need to restart to jvm, which is what it needs the arguments from your main method for.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addJarsToClasspath​(File libDir)
      Adds the given library jar to the classpath.
      void addJarsToClasspath​(String libDir)
      Adds all jar archives in the given directory to the classpath.

      Adds the given library jar to the classpath.
      void addJarToClasspath​(String library)
      Adds the given library jar to the classpath.
      void addJarToClasspath​(JarFile library)
      Adds the given library jar to the classpath.
      void addThisToClasspath()
      Adds ToMe25s-Java-Utilities to the classpath of it is in the libs directory next to this jar.
      static byte[] getBuffer()
      if init got used, this is the way to get its output buffer.
      static void init​(String[] args)
      Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar and adds it to the classpath.
      static void init​(String[] args, File logFile)
      Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log files and the previous output streams.
      static void init​(String[] args, File outputLogFile, File errorLogFile)
      Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log files and the previous output streams.
      static void init​(String[] args, File outputLogFile, File errorLogFile, String defaultUrlStorage)
      Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log files and the previous output streams.
      static void init​(String[] args, File logFile, String defaultUrlStorage)
      Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log file and the previous output streams.
      static void premain​(String args, Instrumentation instrumentation)
      The premain method needed for this Agent to work.

      converts a String Array to a String. entries are separated with a space.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LibraryLoader

        public LibraryLoader​(String[] mainArgs)
              throws IOException
        Creates a new LibraryLoader, it is recommended to do this at the start of your program as this may need to restart to jvm, which is what it needs the arguments from your main method for.
        Parameters:
        mainArgs - the main methods arguments.
        Throws:
        IOException - if this program isn't a jar or doesn't exists. And if somehow creating a JarFile instance fails.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args)
        Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar and adds it to the classpath.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File logFile)
        Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log files and the previous output streams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        logFile - the log file for System.out and System.err. set to null to disable changing System.out and System.err.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File logFile,
                        String defaultUrlStorage)
        Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log file and the previous output streams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        logFile - the log file for System.out and System.err. set to null to disable changing System.out and System.err.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default contents for the URL storage file that lists the urls to try and download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites from.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File outputLogFile,
                        File errorLogFile)
        Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log files and the previous output streams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        outputLogFile - the log file for System.out. set to null to disable changing System.out.
        errorLogFile - the log file for System.err. set to null to disable changing System.err.

      • init

        public static void init​(String[] args,
                        File outputLogFile,
                        File errorLogFile,
                        String defaultUrlStorage)
        Initializes a library loader, restarts your jvm if necessary, tries to download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites, if that doesn't work it tries to extract it from this Jar, adds it to the classpath, and sets the System Outputs to TracingMultiPrintStreams printing to the log files and the previous output streams.
        Parameters:
        args - the program arguments.
        outputLogFile - the log file for System.out. set to null to disable changing System.out.
        errorLogFile - the log file for System.err. set to null to disable changing System.err.
        defaultUrlStorage - the default contents for the URL storage file that lists the urls to try and download ToMe25s-Java-Utilites from.
